name: Circuit: Hyper Drive
description:
This fast paced racing game is highly addictive and extremely fun! As part of our "Circuit" series of racing games, this game is reminiscent of the art style of the 80's this game allows you to upgrade your ship, add boost and use in game credit to get a new ship!

FEATURES:
• 5 different ship racers to choose from
• Upgrade your ships in the garage
• Add boost to your ship for an extra burst of speed
• Multiple color scheme for both the ship and engine effect
• 10 unique track locations
• Retro setting in both visuals and music
• Scalable visual setting for older devices

Please leave feedback or comments here in the review!
